entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres rising to 1800 metres near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023
